dataset_id: GPM DPR Precipitation Profile 1 Day 0.25 degree x 0.25 degree V06 (GPM_3DPRD) at GES DISC
title: GPM DPR Precipitation Profile 1 Day 0.25 degree x 0.25 degree V06 (GPM_3DPRD) at GES DISC
summary:
Version 06 is the current version of the data set. Older versions will no longer be available and have been superseded by Version 06.
. 

The precipitation estimates in the 3DPRD product are a subset of those in the full daily 3DPR product; the retrieval estimates are the same. Since this is a subset, the product is smaller, and Level 3 DPR products present the user with summary information over daily and monthly time periods. These gridded products are in a convenient gridded form and can be used easily in comparisons with other satellite and ground data. 

		The Level 3 DPR joint algorithm subsets precipitation estimates from the Level 3 daily products. In addition, it adds time information from Level 2 instantaneous data to give a date/time for the last measurement in each grid box. The product contains one 0.25 x 25 km grid with separate indices for the ascending and descending parts of the GPM orbit.
